name: Spaceball Pinvader
description:
For LDJam game making competition we were asked to make a fusion of two other games, this is what I came up with!

Controls:

Left Flipper:

A
Left Arrow
Left mouse button
Z
N

Right Flipper:

D
Right Arrow
Right mouse button
L
M

You get a new ball by getting a combo of 5, for this to trigger a second time your combo must go back down to 3, so you can get many balls on the table by getting the combo to 5 and back down to 3 again after.

Because the Ludum Dare Mini competitions do not have a time limit this is the culmination of about 3 or 4 evenings work.

The images are distorted by drawing them out and taking a photo of them on the screen with a camera and then reimporting them back onto the computer.
